prompt: shift the position of the title from the center to the left side of the image
knowledge_prompt: The prompt requires not only repositioning the title text but also preserving its compositional integrity. The vertical colored line adjacent to the title functions as a design element that visually anchors the title; therefore, both should shift together to maintain balance and coherence in the layout. This ensures the semantic intent—repositioning the title while retaining the visual hierarchy—remains fulfilled.
